title: Europe Sees ‘a New Type of War,’ Accusing Belarus of Weaponizing Migrants
content:
1. Europe Sees ‘a New Type of War,’ Accusing Belarus of Weaponizing Migrants  The Wall Street Journal
  2. US concerned about Russian military activity near Ukraine, as House Republicans press Biden to deploy troops  Fox News
  3. US Warning Europe That Russia May Invade Ukraine  Bloomberg
  4. Ukraine's allies are warning Russia against new military escalation, Kyiv says  Reuters
  5. Kremlin denies plans to invade Ukraine, alleges NATO threats  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 欧州は「新しいタイプの戦争」と捉え、ベラルーシが移民を武器にしていると非難
